ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]

> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anti-EQ (was mistmore)
>
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > I
>
> Hear hear! This is the best post I've seen in a long time.
>
> Harm.

ROFL.

Well this is a bard discussion list. Perhaps this is a heavily symbolic poem
where he's standing up for his own individuality. "Me" would have conveyed a
more possessive meaning, where "I" seems more of a "I am" type of statement.
:-)

> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Bah, Bugger off! lol=)
> I have some email problems, and onelist Randomly erases all
> but the first
> letter of the first word in my emails. it is annoying;)

Or it could just be a technical problem. :-P

I don't really see how onelist would truncate your emails. Hmm. Unless your
mail server and their mail server lose their connection while transferring
your email.

---Windleaf
